title: History Extra podcast - September 2007
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - September 2007
itunes:subtitle: Professor Harry Gelber looks back over China's long history, Historical biographer Alison Weir and author and historian Tracy Borman tell the stories of two royal mistresses.
description:
Professor Harry Gelber looks back over China's long history, Historical biographer Alison Weir and author and historian Tracy Borman tell the stories of two royal mistresses.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
